title: Create Tool
text: Create a new tool object that appears in the geometry view of the tool Navigator

title: Create Geometry
text: Creates a new geometry group object that appears in the geometry view of the tool Navigator

title: Create Operation
text: Creates a operation that appears in all views of the process Navigator

title: Create Program
text: Creates a new program group that appears in all views of the process Navigator

title: Blisk Rough
text:
The milling process uses a cutting layer between the hub and the cladding to remove material between the blades and the diverter blades.

Specifies the component geometry, blank geometry, hub, cladding, blade, blade root fillet, and shunt blade geometry.
Edit drive method to specify cutting mode.

is recommended for roughing between the blades of a disk with a rotating hub.

title: Blisk Hub Finish
text:
The milling process finishes the wheel hub.

Specifies the component geometry, blank geometry, hub, cladding, blade, blade root fillet, and shunt blade geometry.
Edit drive method to specify cutting mode.

Recommended for finishing wheels with blades with rotating hubs.

title: Blisk Blade Finish
text:
The milling process refines the blade in multiple cutting layers.

Specifies component geometry, blank geometry, hub, cladding, blade, blade root fillet, and shunt blade geometry.
Edit the driver method to specify the cutting mode.

Recommended for finishing blades and shunt blades on turbomachinery components.

title: Trim/Extend
text: Trim or extend a curve by the particular method.

title: Curve Split
text: Split the curve by the other curve or the surface.

title: Curve Merge
text: Merge the curves.

title: Project Curve
text: Project a curve on a surface by picking them.

title: Create Intersection
text: Create a intersrcting curve by picking two surfaces.

title: Curve Direction
text: Reverse the picked curve direction and display the direction with an arrow.

title: Single Surface
text: Reparamererize an arbitary surface conforming to the edges.

title: Create Guiding
text: Create curves on selected path faces using guiding curves.

title: Extend Surface
text: Extend a surface in U and V directions.

title: Surface Trim
text: Trim a surface by picking it and then a curve to trim it.

title: Create Rotated
text: Create a rotated surface by revolving and displacing a curve.

title: Curves Loft
text: Loft a group of curves.

title: Transform
text: Displace and revolve a curve or a surface.

title: Surface Deviation
text: Analyze the deviation of a surface by the reference surface.
